title: bcd-watch: New baselines (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD New Baselines Report, Tue Jun 18 2024

Summary of Baseline changes
from Fri Jun 07 2024 19:05:08 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue Jun 18 2024 10:25:45 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

42 new Baseline implementations

api

  1. ContentVisibilityAutoStateChangeEvent ➞ ContentVisibilityAutoStateChangeEvent  ➞  Added to Safari
  2. ContentVisibilityAutoStateChangeEvent  ➞  Added to Safari
  3. ContentVisibilityAutoStateChangeEvent ➞ skipped  ➞  Added to Safari
  4. Element ➞ getHTML  ➞  Added to Firefox, Safari
  5. HTMLCanvasElement ➞ getContext ➞ 2d_context ➞ options_willReadFrequently_parameter  ➞  Added to Safari
  6. HTMLTemplateElement ➞ shadowRootClonable  ➞  Added to Safari
  7. HTMLTemplateElement ➞ shadowRootDelegatesFocus  ➞  Added to Safari
  8. HTMLTemplateElement ➞ shadowRootSerializable  ➞  Added to Firefox, Safari
  9. RTCRtpReceiver ➞ getParameters  ➞  Added to Firefox
  10. RTCRtpReceiver ➞ getParameters ➞ return_object_property_codecs  ➞  Added to Firefox
  11. RTCRtpTransceiver ➞ setCodecPreferences  ➞  Added to Firefox
  12. ShadowRoot ➞ getHTML  ➞  Added to Firefox
  13. ShadowRoot ➞ serializable  ➞  Added to Firefox, Safari
  14. URL ➞ parse_static  ➞  Added to Chrome, Safari

css

  1. properties ➞ align-content ➞ flex_context ➞ safe_unsafe  ➞  Added to Safari
  2. properties ➞ align-items ➞ flex_context ➞ safe_unsafe  ➞  Added to Safari
  3. properties ➞ align-self ➞ flex_context ➞ safe_unsafe  ➞  Added to Safari
  4. properties ➞ content-visibility ➞ auto  ➞  Added to Safari
  5. properties ➞ content-visibility ➞ hidden  ➞  Added to Safari
  6. properties ➞ content-visibility ➞ visible  ➞  Added to Safari
  7. properties ➞ font-size-adjust ➞ from-font  ➞  Added to Chrome
  8. properties ➞ font-size-adjust ➞ none  ➞  Added to Chrome
  9. properties ➞ font-size-adjust ➞ two-values  ➞  Added to Chrome
  10. properties ➞ justify-content ➞ flex_context ➞ safe_unsafe  ➞  Added to Safari
  11. properties ➞ offset-path ➞ basic_shape  ➞  Added to Safari
  12. properties ➞ offset-path ➞ coord_box  ➞  Added to Safari
  13. types ➞ color ➞ color ➞ relative_syntax  ➞  Added to Firefox
  14. types ➞ color ➞ hsl ➞ relative_syntax  ➞  Added to Firefox
  15. types ➞ color ➞ hwb ➞ relative_syntax  ➞  Added to Firefox
  16. types ➞ color ➞ lab ➞ relative_syntax  ➞  Added to Firefox
  17. types ➞ color ➞ lch ➞ relative_syntax  ➞  Added to Firefox
  18. types ➞ color ➞ oklab ➞ relative_syntax  ➞  Added to Firefox
  19. types ➞ color ➞ oklch ➞ relative_syntax  ➞  Added to Firefox
  20. types ➞ calc ➞ color_component  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari

html

  1. elements ➞ form ➞ autocomplete ➞ one-time-code  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  2. elements ➞ img ➞ usemap ➞ case_sensitive  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  3. elements ➞ input ➞ autocomplete  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
  4. elements ➞ select ➞ autocomplete  ➞  Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari
